author: SIBY JEYYA
title: IND vs AUS 2nd ODI: Virat Kohli Dismissed For A Duck Again
text:
IND vs AUS 2nd ODI: Virat Kohli Dismissed For A Duck Again!
Virat Kohli’s duck in the 2nd ODI adds another twist to his Australian struggle saga. But if history is any indicator, every setback only fuels his comeback — and fans are eagerly waiting for the roar of the king once again.
